verse_text: In peace I will lie down and sleep, for you alone, Lord, make me dwell in safety.
reflection: Lay down the day’s weight. Safety is not in control—it’s in His care.
prayer: Lord, I surrender tonight. Guard my rest and quiet my heart. Amen.

verse_text: Do not be anxious about anything... and the peace of God will guard your hearts and minds.
reflection: Release every anxious loop to God; peace is better at guarding than worry.
prayer: Father, I hand You every concern. Guard my mind with Your peace. Amen.

verse_text: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
reflection: Rest is a person before it is a place; come to Jesus with the day.
prayer: Jesus, I come. I exchange my burdens for Your rest. Amen.

verse_text: Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.
reflection: Surrender is not defeat; it is trust in the One who cares.
prayer: Lord, I cast, not carry. Take all that weighs me down. Amen.

verse_text: He makes me lie down in green pastures... He restores my soul.
reflection: Let the Shepherd lead you from striving to stillness.
prayer: Shepherd of my soul, restore me as I rest in You. Amen.

verse_text: You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in you.
reflection: Fix your mind, not on outcomes, but on the One who holds them.
prayer: God, fix my thoughts on You and keep me in perfect peace. Amen.

verse_text: He who watches over Israel will neither slumber nor sleep.
reflection: Since He stays awake, you don’t have to.
prayer: Watcher of my life, I sleep while You keep watch. Amen.

verse_text: His mercies are new every morning.
reflection: End the day with gratitude—mercy will meet you at dawn.
prayer: Thank You for mercy past and mercy ahead. Amen.

verse_text: When you lie down, you will not be afraid; your sleep will be sweet.
reflection: Sweet sleep grows in surrendered hearts.
prayer: Lord, remove fear and give me sweet rest. Amen.

verse_text: Be still, and know that I am God.
reflection: Stillness is the doorway to knowing; slow your soul.
prayer: God, I quiet myself before You. Re-center me in Your presence. Amen.

verse_text: My peace I give you.
reflection: His peace isn’t borrowed—it’s given. Receive it.
prayer: Prince of Peace, fill the room of my heart. Amen.

verse_text: Search me, God, and know my heart... lead me in the way everlasting.
reflection: Let God sift your motives; surrender what He reveals.
prayer: Search me, Lord. Cleanse and lead me tonight. Amen.

verse_text: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins.
reflection: Confession clears the sky; forgiveness restores fellowship.
prayer: Faithful God, I confess and receive Your cleansing. Amen.

verse_text: I keep my eyes always on the Lord. With him at my right hand, I will not be shaken.
reflection: Fix your gaze—stability follows focus.
prayer: Lord, hold me steady as I rest in You. Amen.

verse_text: Approach God’s throne of grace with confidence...
reflection: Grace is open tonight; bring your need honestly.
prayer: Father, I come to Your throne for mercy and help. Amen.

verse_text: Whoever dwells in the shelter of the Most High will rest in the shadow of the Almighty.
reflection: Rest happens under His shadow, not under pressure.
prayer: Almighty, cover me. I dwell in Your shelter. Amen.

verse_text: Do not worry about tomorrow...
reflection: Tomorrow is God’s; release it.
prayer: Lord, I place tomorrow in Your hands and sleep in peace. Amen.

verse_text: Truly my soul finds rest in God; my salvation comes from him.
reflection: Rest is found, not forced—find it in Him.
prayer: God, let my soul rest only in You. Amen.

verse_text: Apart from me you can do nothing.
reflection: Release performance; remain in the Vine.
prayer: Jesus, I abide in You. Work while I rest. Amen.

verse_text: I lie down and sleep; I wake again, because the Lord sustains me.
reflection: Your waking is proof of His keeping; trust Him again.
prayer: Sustainer, keep me through the night. Amen.

verse_text: In all things God works for the good of those who love him.
reflection: Release control; God is already weaving good.
prayer: Father, I trust Your weaving hands. Amen.

verse_text: The LORD is close to the brokenhearted...
reflection: Let Him be near to what hurts; invite comfort.
prayer: Lord, be close; mend what is torn. Amen.

verse_text: Do not fear, for I am with you... I will uphold you.
reflection: Hands off fear, hands up in trust.
prayer: Uphold me with Your righteous right hand. Amen.

verse_text: May the words of my mouth and the meditation of my heart be pleasing in your sight.
reflection: Let the day’s residue be refined into worship.
prayer: God, purify my thoughts and words as I rest. Amen.

verse_text: Through faith you are shielded by God’s power...
reflection: Your life is shielded; sleep within His defense.
prayer: Shield me, Lord, and surround my home with peace. Amen.

verse_text: Be still before the Lord and wait patiently for him.
reflection: Choose stillness over striving—wait without worry.
prayer: Teach me to wait well, Lord. Amen.

verse_text: He who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion.
reflection: Unfinished doesn’t mean uncertain—God is still working.
prayer: Finish what You started in me, Lord. Amen.

verse_text: On my bed I remember you; I think of you through the watches of the night.
reflection: Turn the night into worship and remembrance.
prayer: I remember Your faithfulness and sing in my heart. Amen.

verse_text: To him who is able to keep you from stumbling...
reflection: He is able to keep you; rest in that ability, not yours.
prayer: Keeper of my soul, hold me steady tonight. Amen.

verse_text: The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face shine on you... and give you peace.
reflection: End this month under the blessing of His face shining upon you.
prayer: Lord, bless and keep me; give me peace as I close this month. Amen.
